name: Amish Buttermilk Biscuits
author: Yoly
summary: These big, flaky, and tender biscuits are a breeze to make with ingredients you most likely have. Ideal breakfast biscuits or for any meal of the day.
ingredients: 2 cups flour, plus more for dusting
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper and spray with nonstick cooking spray
Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and sugar in a large bowl
Add buttermilk and stir until just combined
Place on a floured surface and pat into a circle about 1-inch thick
Arrange 6 biscuits in a circle, 1 in the center, edges touching
Bake in the preheated oven until bottoms are browned and tops are starting to brown, 11 to 14 minutes
